events.message: I am filing a claim due to severe flooding that damaged my entire ground floor after the recent storm.
The claim has been categorised under Home Damage as it involves flooding and property water damage.
An agent has been assigned to handle your home damage claim related to the recent flood damage.
We have officially acknowledged your claim and initiated the process to assist with your flood-damaged property.
Please submit photos of the flood damage and any repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including photos and contractor bids for roof and floor repairs have been submitted.
The investigation into the flood damage claim is now underway to assess the extent and validity of the losses.
The investigation has concluded confirming water damage to walls, floors, and electrical systems due to flooding.
We propose a settlement of $15,000 to cover repairs of flood damage including structural and electrical work.
The customer has reviewed the settlement offer and is currently considering the proposed amount and terms.
Your claim has been approved for the proposed settlement amount after reviewing all documentation and feedback.
The settlement payment has been processed and issued to your designated bank account for repair costs.
This home damage claim is now officially closed following the successful settlement and payment disbursement.
The claim records have been archived and stored securely for future reference and audit purposes.
